question: What is the approximate total length of Railway track in India?
explanation: Indian Railways is one of the world's largest railway networks comprising 1,21,407 km of track length over a route of 67,368 km (41,834 mi). Indian Railway is Worldâ€™s fourth largest railway US, Russia and China. It carried some 23 million passengers everyday and around 1060 million tonnes of freight in a year.
